body_html:
On CentOS I was able to successfully build cuda and non-cuda TF, at head using bazel.
I was not able to reproduce the problem later reported in this issue.

I will now test building with MKL.

body:
On CentOS I was able to successfully build cuda and non-cuda TF,  at head using bazel.
I was not able to reproduce the problem later reported in this issue.

I will now test building with MKL.
